website_summaries.verdict: Unique style and design makes this a one-door mirror you won't mind having on the outside as an accent piece. Adds visual flair to any door surface.
pros: Oval-shaped profile focuses the view on the face and upper torso
Great for adding some visual interest on virtually any door in the home
cons: Oval design fails to capture the whole view of oneself when in use

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love mirror, but yes it does knock around with the opening and closing of door unless the door is completely flat. I want to hang on wall, but unsure what could support weight. Not parting with mirror because so beautifully perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Keepuncher

customer_reviews.title: like the mirror a lot but I don't like how ...
customer_reviews.text: like the mirror a lot but I don't like how it swings when you open the door. there should be something that comes along with it to stop the swinging
customer_reviews.author: TRJ

customer_reviews.title: Mirror was not set properly. Glass was hanging off ...
customer_reviews.text: Mirror was not set properly. Glass was hanging off on right side and left side, where mirror should have been, was exposed and sticky and full of the Styrofoam used to keep the glass safe. But its a gorgeous mirror and I think I just received a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Erykah

customer_reviews.title: Mirror is perfect for daughter's room.
customer_reviews.text: Mirror looks great on daughter's bedroom closet door. I don't notice any distortion in the reflection. We did use a little extra two-sided tape to make sure it didn't move when the door opens and closes.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, unique style.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something stylish to hang in my apartment on the bathroom door. This is perfect. It’s from Bed Bath and Beyond. Good quality. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Paula P

customer_reviews.title: The mirror is beautifully designed and fit perfectly on a bedroom door!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror - just right for my bedroom door!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror! I installed it myself in under 3 minutes. Hangs beautifully, very high quality glass !
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Collett

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery. Product is as described. Easy installation, just hang on your door!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. As described, versatile, well made and easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Mirror, mirror on my door...
customer_reviews.text: It took longer to unpack than to hang it! I'm not complaining though, it was very well wrapped, and arrived in perfect condition. And to those that said it wasn't beveled, um, you were wrong. It is beveled, simple and beautiful. I took all of 5 minutes to put it up--that included reading the instructions. It is perfect in my bedroom. I may consider getting a second one to hang horizontally over my fireplace mantle.
customer_reviews.author: EOS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful and I love the height very much.
customer_reviews.author: jenny hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Elegant and beautiful mirror. We hung it on the wall and it is a quality mirror. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa C

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: High quality mirror. Attachments made it easy to hang. looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but cheaper from Bed, Bath & Beyond
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror! 2 seconds to hang, no tools required, looks great! However, it is $119 at Bed, Bath & Beyond! Oh, with free shipping!
customer_reviews.author: JAYSKYWALKER
